description: SPECTRE is touted to be a broker-less financial trading platform with an embedded decentralized liquidity pool. The name SPECTRE is short for Speculative Tokenized Trading Exchange. Aiming to give control of client funds back to the clients, the dividend-token holders my be entitled to a percentage of trader’s wins or losses in the system, regardless of whether trades are performed on the system itself or other decentralized applications connected to their liquidity pool.
name: Spectre.ai Dividend Token
